title: JCO and I - author argues difference

content.prompt: In Paragraph 1, the author argues that the difference between "writing" and "writers" is primarily that the

choices.label: person doing the writing can never really understand the truth expressed in the writing
person doing the writing is perceived as less real than the writing that is produced
writing can be perfect but the person doing the writing can be flawed
writing itself is never as vital as the person doing the writing

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
